column1: Transparency is a must. Why hide this data? Florida medical examiners were releasing #coronavirus death data. The state made them stop. https://www.tampabay.com/news/health/2020/04/29/florida-medical-examiners-were-releasing-coronavirus-death-data-the-state-made-them-stop/ #COVID19

I think this is a good move - at least there is some evidence of benefit, though not a blockbuster - FDA likely to authorize emergency use of new #coronavirus treatment: NYT https://thehill.com/policy/healthcare/495292-fda-to-authorize-emergency-use-of-new-coronavirus-treatment-nyt#.Xqn8wBnhFyQ.twitter #COVID19

#Covid2019 is killing older people, kids not so much. But #flu is bad for kids and why we push #flushots - Amid #coronavirus fears, a second wave of flu hits US kids https://apnews.com/2019443fda5196409bba61e23180cec6 … #vaccines

It is hypocritical but a good thing for patients. We want to encourage testing and healthcare for those who are sick.  Don't worry, the Dems will be back in November, we'll make this right in 2021.  #coronavirus #COVID19
